Statistical Model: 

$\begin{aligned}
Y_i &\sim \text{Bernoulli}(\pi_i) \\
\pi_i &= \pi  \\
Y_i &\perp \!\!\! \perp Y_j \quad \forall \: i \neq j \\
\end{aligned}$
